titleInfo.title: "Selten gewinnt" - Rare wins. Changes in the frequencies of family names as a consequence of rational choice

bibliographicCitation.ieee: H. Jockusch and A. Fuhrmann, “"Selten gewinnt" - Rare wins. Changes in the frequencies of family names as a consequence of rational choice”, Beiträge zur Namenforschung, vol. 45, 2010, pp. 127-142.
